name: Santa Bear Jump - Mega Christmas Teddy Leap FREE
name_original: Santa Bear Jump - Mega Christmas Teddy Leap FREE
description: Get into the Christmas Spirit with this addictive jumping game.  It seems simple but with objects coming in both directions and having to jump two different characters, it's madly difficult with little forgiveness for mistakes.  It's the perfect way to burn up a few minutes when you're bored.  Why wait, download it today!
